effects.1: You were frozen solid, and all that remains of who you once were is a statue of ice in your likeness
effects.2: Flesh, fat, and muscle have hardened to ice, encasing your bones in a frozen shell.
effects.3: Your flesh is frozen too solid for even the crows to peck at.
effects.4: Your friends might mistake your frozen form for a statue.
effects.5: The frostbitten pallor of your skin tells of your chilling end.
effects.6: Frozen to the core, your icy fate is evident.

effects.1: Flesh, fat, and muscle have hardened to ice, encasing your bones in a frozen shell.
effects.2: Your flesh is frozen too solid for even the crows to peck at.
effects.3: Your friends might mistake your frozen form for a statue.
effects.4: The frostbitten pallor of your skin tells of your chilling end.
effects.5: Frozen to the core, your icy fate is evident.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely intact and ready for a noble funeral.

condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: All your limbs are lost to frostbite, your lungs are ruined, and your face frozen in a grimace (as per both arms burned off both, both legs burned off, lungs blackened, gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Your eyes, ears, nose, and lips were destroyed by the frigid cold (as per both eyes lost, both ears lost, lips and tongue lost, and gruesome scarring)
effects.3: Both legs are lost to frostbite (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both arms are lost to frostbite (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions).
effects.5: Both your eyes were frozen solid by the cold (blinded, -4 attack throws, no LOS, movement reduced to ¼ normal, -2 to surprise rolls)
effects.6: Your chilling screams were silenced as frostbite claimed your lips and tongue (mute, cannot speak, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, and -4 to reaction rolls).

condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: One leg and one arm were lost to frostbite; the other half were merely blackened (as per one leg lost, one arm lost, notable scarring)
effects.2: Both of your ears and most of your face were lost to frostbite (-2 to Listening throws, -2 to surprise rolls, gruesome scarring)
effects.3: One leg is lost to frostbite (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One arm is lost to frostbite (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon).
effects.5: One of your eyes froze in the cold  (-2 to missile attack throws).
effects.6: Part of your lips and jaw is black with frostbite  (notable scarring).

condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your lungs were ruined by inhaling icy frost (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilder-ness movement reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3)
effects.2: Your genitals are lost to frostbite (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known).
effects.3: One foot is lost to frostbite (peg required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.4: One hand is lost to frostbite (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons).
effects.5: The flesh of one of your cheeks is numb and marked by frostbite (notable scarring).
effects.6: Your fingernails are blued from frostbite (minor scarring).

condition_recovery: You are shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of rest.

effects.1: Your face stiffens like a mask, its muscles permanently frozen into a horrific grimace (gruesome scarring).
effects.2: Your ear is lost to frostbite  (-1 to Listening throws and -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.3: 1d3 toes on one foot are lost to frostbite (3 lost toes on one foot makes foot useless).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers on one hand are lost to frostbite (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: The smallest finger on one hand is lost to frostbite (3 lost fingers on a hand makes it useless).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: The numbness from the frostbite is ever-present and unending (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: Your hair froze and broke off like brittle icicles. Half your torso and one arm are blackened with frostbite (two notable scarrings).
effects.3: Your hair froze and broke off and your scalp blackened with frostbite, leaving your scalp (notable scarring).
effects.4: Your hand has a scar where the flesh died in the cold (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: In bad weather, you remember the bone-chilling cold (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: Half your torso and one arm are pale and stiff with frostbite patterns (notable scarring).
effects.3: Your shoulder has blueish numb mark where the cold bit deepest (minor scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.
